EmailTemplate.subject: What's hot @HAT? The 131-9B APU
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Now is the right time to take advantage of a special priced Auxiliary Power Unit: the 131-9B, designed for Boeing 737 NG aircraft. The 131-9Bs in stock are available for immediate purchase and distribution from the HAT warehouses in the USA and the UK.
The Auxiliary Power Units we have in stock have the following characteristics:
- OEM repaired – no Parts Manufacturer Approved (PMA) or Designated Engineer Representative (DER) in the units and provide OEM reliability & warranty
- Have complete back to birth records on life-limited parts
- Traced back to last operator with a clean non-incident statement
With HAT you have access to the right part, for the right price, exactly when you need it!
FOR QUOTES AND INQUIRIES , PLEASE CLICK HERE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HAT_131-9B_APU.html]]>
HAT is a growing provider of pre-owned certified parts (both Honeywell and other manufacturers' products) to all aviation customers world-wide, with a global sales force.
